item.title: How to make quests tut (noob friendly)
item.dc:creator: @co_nick co nick
item.description:
@co_nick wrote:

Please comment
Making A Quest-FULL Tutorial - (Beginner Friendly)
Author - Nickscape/Nick and firebull all i did is post
NOTE - This tutorial is copywrited! Even though this IS a copy and paste tutorial, you are not permitted to copy this tutorial and call it your own. LEECHERS WILL NOT BE TOLERATED!
NOTE - This is my FIRST EVER Tutorial, so all feedback is welcome! Please post anything that would make my tutorial easier! Also, if you recieve any errors, please post the error message you get and what you did before the error.
Tutorial Type - Copy and Paste Tutorial
Difficulty: 2/10 for Modderate Coders 4/10 for Beginner Coders
Server source tested: Phatt-Isle, but it should work with most.
NOTE - Backup these files before editing!
Documents changed: “Login.java”, “PacketManager.java”, “NPCOption1.java”, “ActionButtons.java”, “Player.java”, “npcspawn.cfg”

STEP 1 - “Login.java”

First, open up “Login.java” and search for:
p.frames.setString(p, “Phatt-Isle Quests:”, 274, 6);

Now, under:
p.frames.setString(p, “Dragon Slayer”, 274, 7);

Add this:
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 274, 8);

And change this:
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 274, 8+i);

To this:
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 274, 9+i);

Now save and close “Login.java”

STEP 2 - “npcspawn.cfg”

First, open up “npcspawn.cfg” and search for:
spawn = 742 2853 9636 0 2857 9641 2851 9634 Elvarg

Now, under that add:
spawn = NPC1 xxxx yyyy height 0 0 0 0 NPC NAME
spawn = NPC2 xxxx yyyy height 0 0 0 0 NPC NAME
spawn = NPC3 xxxx yyyy height 0 0 0 0 NPC NAME
spawn = NPC4 xxxx yyyy height 0 0 0 0 NPC NAME
spawn = NPC5 xxxx yyyy height 0 0 0 0 NPC NAME
spawn = NPC6 xxxx yyyy height 0 0 0 0 NPC NAME

Keep adding NPCs for each NPC in your quest.

Now save and close “npcspawn.cfg”

STEP 3 - “ActionButtons.java”
NOTE - This step is a long step.

First, open up “ActionButtons.java” and search for:
if(p.DragonSlayer == 5)

Now, under:
p.frames.setString(p, “I now can wear rune platebodies and dragon chainbodies!”, 275, 14);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 14+i);
}

}
break;
}
break;

Add this:
case 8://QUEST NAME HERE
for(int i = 0; i < 30; i++)
{
if(p.QuestNameHere == 0)
{
p.frames.showInterface(p, 275);
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 275, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “To start this quest, speak to PUT NPC1 NAME HERE.”, 275, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “He is located PUT YOUR LOCATION HERE.”, 275, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “DESCRIPTION OF WHERE LOCATION IS.”, 275, 14);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 14+i);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 1)
{
p.frames.showInterface(p, 275);
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 275, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1 told me to speak to NPC2.”, 275, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “He is located in PUT A LOCATION HERE.”, 275, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 13+i);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 2)
{
p.frames.showInterface(p, 275);
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 275, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2 put me on a quest to PUT YOUR TASK HERE.”, 275, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1 will give me more information.”, 275, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 13+i);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 3)
{
p.frames.showInterface(p, 275);
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 275, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “The NPC4 HERE is located in YOUR LOCATION HERE.”, 275, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “I will need ITEM1 NAME HERE from NPC3.”, 275, 14);
p.frames.setString(p, “I will need ITEM2 NAME HERE to ITEM2 PURPOSE.”, 275, 15);
p.frames.setString(p, “I will need ITEM3 NAME HERE to get there.”, 275, 16);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 16+i);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 4)
{
p.frames.showInterface(p, 275);
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 275, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “I COMPLETED TASK HERE!”, 275, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “I should return to NPC2 and tell him.”, 275, 14);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 14+i);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 5)
{
p.frames.showInterface(p, 275);
p.frames.setString(p, “QUEST NAME HERE”, 275, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “<col=66FF33>QUEST COMPLETE”, 275, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “I can now PUT ABILITY HERE!”, 275, 14);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 275, 14+i);
}

}
break;
}
break;

Now, save and close “ActionButtons.java”

STEP 4 - “Player.java”

First, open up “Player.java” and search for:
public int DragonSlayer = 0;

Now, under that add:
public int QuestNameHere = 0;

Next, search for:
if(DragonSlayer == 0)

Now, under:
frames.setString(this, “<col=66FF33>Dragon Slayer”, 274, 7);
}

Add this:
if(QuestNameHere == 0)
{
frames.setString(this, “Quest Name Here”, 274, 8);
}
else if(QuestNameHere > 0 && QuestNameHere < 5)
{
frames.setString(this, “<col=FFFF00>Quest Name Here”, 274, 8);
}
else if(QuestNameHere == 5)
{
frames.setString(this, “<col=66FF33>Quest Name Here”, 274, 8);
}

Now, save and close “Player.java”

STEP 5 - “PacketManager.java”

First, open up “PacketManager.java” and search for:
p.frames.setString(p, “Congratulations!”, 277, 3);

Now, under:
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 277, 17);
p.frames.removeChatboxInterface§;
}

Add this:
p.Dialogue = 111;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Well then speak to NPC2 in PUT A LOCATION HERE.”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 111) {
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.QuestNameHere = 1;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “He should have a mighty quest for you!”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 112) {
p.Dialogue = 113;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You will need ITEM1 NAME HERE, ship, and ITEM3 NAME HERE to”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 113) {
p.Dialogue = 114;
p.QuestNameHere = 3;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “PUT ITEM3 PURPOSE HERE.”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 114) {
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.setString(p, “How can I find a route to YOUR LOCATION HERE?”, 458, 1);
p.frames.setString(p, “Where can I find the right ship?”, 458, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “How can I ITEM3 PURPOSE HERE?”, 458, 3);
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 458);
p.Smithing = false;
p.Cooking = false;
p.TalkAgent = false;
p.DecorChange = false;
p.Choice = 1;
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 115) {
p.Dialogue = 116;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “There is somthing you could do…”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 116) {
p.Dialogue = 117;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “YOUR TASK HERE in YOUR LOCATION HERE.”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 117) {
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.QuestNameHere = 2;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Go back to NPC1, he can help.”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 118) {
p.Dialogue = 0;
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, ITEM1-id, 1);
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC5-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC5”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Well here it is…good thing I didnt loose it.”, 241, 4);
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 119) {
p.setCoords(YOUR LOCATION xxxx, YOUR LOCATION yyyy, height);
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.BoatTimer = 6;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 544);
p.frames.removeChatboxInterface§;
}
else
if(p.Dialogue == 120) {
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.QuestPoints += 2;
p.QuestNameHere = 5;
p.addSkillXP(180650 ,0);
p.addSkillXP(180650 ,2);
p.frames.showInterface(p, 277);
p.frames.setString(p, “Congratulations!”, 277, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You have completed the QUEST NAME HERE quest!”, 277, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, “Quest Points:”, 277, 6);
p.frames.setString(p, “”+p.QuestPoints, 277, 7);
p.frames.setString(p, “2 Quest Points”, 277, 10);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ability to NEW ABILITY HERE”, 277, 11);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ability to NEW ABILITY HERE”, 277, 12);
p.frames.setString(p, “1,000 SKILL NAME HERE XP”, 277, 13);
p.frames.setString(p, “1,000 SKILL NAME HERE XP”, 277, 14);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 277, 15);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 277, 16);
p.frames.setString(p, “”, 277, 17);
p.frames.removeChatboxInterface§;
}

Now, search for:
if(p.Dialogue == 111) {

Then, change this:
if(p.Dialogue == 111) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9814, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9813, 1);
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Take this cape as a reward!”, 241, 4);
}

To this:
if(p.Dialogue == 121) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9814, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9813, 1);
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Take this cape as a reward!”, 241, 4);
}

Now, save and close “PacketManager.java”

STEP 6 - “NPCOption1.java”

First, open up “NPCOption1.java” and search for:
if(pnp.npcType == 744)

Now, under:
p.frames.setString(p, “KIarense”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Sorry mate, I’m busy.”, 241, 4);
}
}

Add this:
if(pnp.npcType == NPC1-id)//NPC1
{

if(p.QuestNameHere == 0)
{
p.Dialogue = 110;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Looking for a quest are you?”, 241, 4);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 1)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Go speak to NPC2 in PUT A LOCATION HERE…”, 241, 4);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 2)
{
p.Dialogue = 112;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ah yes, NPC4 HERE of YOUR LOCATION HERE…”, 241, 4);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 3)
{
p.frames.setString(p, “How can I find a route to YOUR LOCATION HERE?”, 458, 1);
p.frames.setString(p, “Where can I find the right ship?”, 458, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “How can I protect myself from NPC4 HERE?”, 458, 3);
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 458);
p.Smithing = false;
p.Cooking = false;
p.TalkAgent = false;
p.DecorChange = false;
p.Choice = 1;
}

if(p.QuestNameHere == 4)
{
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,TASK ITEM ID HERE, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, TASK ITEM ID HERE), 28);
p.Dialogue = 120;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wow, you PUT YOUR TASK HERE! Accept this reward.”, 241, 4);
}

if(p.QuestNameHere == 5)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC1-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Hello…”, 241, 4);
}
}

if(pnp.npcType == NPC2-id)//NPC2
{

if(p.QuestNameHere == 0)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9785, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “What are you looking at noob?”, 241, 4);
}

if(p.QuestNameHere == 1)
{
p.Dialogue = 115;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC1 sent you right…”, 241, 4);
}

if(p.QuestNameHere == 2)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Go speak to NPC1 for help.”, 241, 4);
}

if(p.QuestNameHere > 2 && p.QuestNameHere < 4)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9785, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You haven’t PUT YOUR TASK HERE yet!”, 241, 4);
}

if(p.QuestNameHere == 4)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wow, you COMPLETED TASK HERE? Go tell NPC1!”, 241, 4);
}
if(p.QuestNameHere == 5)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC2-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC2”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Good job COMPLETED TASK HERE.”, 241, 4);
}
}

if(pnp.npcType == NPC3-id)//NPC3
{
if(p.QuestNameHere < 3)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9785, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC3-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC3”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You should not be wandering around…”, 241, 4);
}
else
{
p.Dialogue = 118;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC3-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC3”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You are looking for a ITEM1 to YOUR LOCATION HERE?”, 241, 4);
}

}

if(pnp.npcType == NPC5-id)//NPC5
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, ITEM2-id, 1);
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC5-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC5”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Take this ITEM2 NAME HERE…”, 241, 4);
}

if(pnp.npcType == NPC6-id)//NPC6
{
if(p.QuestNameHere > 2)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.setString(p, “Can you sail me to YOUR LOCATION HERE?”, 458, 1);
p.frames.setString(p, “Do you like NPC4?”, 458, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Never mind…”, 458, 3);
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 458);
p.Smithing = false;
p.Cooking = false;
p.TalkAgent = false;
p.DecorChange = false;
p.Choice = 2;
}
else
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC6-id, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC6”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Sorry, I’m busy.”, 241, 4);
}
}

Now, search for:
if(pnp.npcType == 2253)//Wise Old Man

And change this:
if(pnp.npcType == 2253)//Wise Old Man
{
if(p.QuestPoints < 2)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ehh, you haven’t completed all Phatt-Isle Quests…”, 241, 4);
}
else
{
p.Dialogue = 111;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Looks like you completed all the quests…”, 241, 4);
}

}

To this:
if(pnp.npcType == 2253)//Wise Old Man
{
if(p.QuestPoints < 2)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ehh, you haven’t completed all Phatt-Isle Quests…”, 241, 4);
}
else
{
p.Dialogue = 121;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Looks like you completed all the quests…”, 241, 4);
}

}

Now, save and close “NPCOption1.java”

STEP 7 - Final Step/Credits

Now, all you have to do is compile your server and then test it out!
